TopicTitle: Smarter every day new series on Space

Articles.Content:
Just thought some people might be interested to know that Smarter Every Day, Dustin, is starting a new youtube series about space and all things related. New episodes will happen monthly, in addition to his normal videos.

Check out the intro/pitch.
